ctx: induction l as [| b l' IHl].
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "fold_left f l' (h a)" in the current goal.

ctx: induction l as [| b l' IHl].
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "h (f a b)" in the current goal.

ctx: induction l as [| b l' IHl].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type f : A -> B -> A h : A -> A a : A b : B H : h (f a b) = f (h a) b l' : list B IHl : fold_left f l' (h a) = h (fold_left f l' a) X0 : A Unable to unify "h (fold_left f l' (f a b))" with "fold_left f l' (f (h a) b)".

original: intros H a l. induction l as [| b l' IHl]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. intros. rewrite IHl. specialize (H a b). rewrite H. reflexivity.
